descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ske4FS8.png[/img]


[img]http://s30.postimg.org/m9pim53v5/Christmas_Armor.png[/img]
By Carter641

[youtube]iH2cYaU9VaE[/youtube]
[img]http://s27.postimg.org/q5jlk2k8j/Information.png[/img]


A new festive armored catsuit for the Christmas season. This is only available in [b]UNP [/b]unless someone converts it to other body types.
The armor is fairly strong and fully upgradable. The textures are made from scratch and although it is not strictly lore friendly, it's sure to add a Christmas spirit to all the dragonborns.

(Just to let you all know, the present in the house where you obtain the armor is a little glitchy and doesn't havok settle correctly, so if you run or walk into it then it may move. However it is only a minor problem and I'll try to patch it.)

Beware.....The house is not navmeshed correctly so followers cannot enter and the present that holds the armor may try to kill you. If you experience some transparency issues it is caused by EMB's and I am not sure how to fix this. It's just a bit of fun so don't be offended by the camel toe!!!!


[img]http://s28.postimg.org/5n6ppgi4d/Acquisition.png[/img]
Along with a new armor, this mod also adds a new Christmas house in Whiterun. The armor can be found inside in a special present left from Santa Claus.

[img]http://s17.postimg.org/6ht9bf5an/Present.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/auLk1KW.png[/img]


[img]http://s13.postimg.org/86bzf7pmv/Tempering.png[/img]

The armor is upgradable via the work bench using these ingredients:

[b][u][i]Hat[/i][/u][/b]
x1 Wolf Pelt
---
[b][i][u]Body[/u][/i][/b]
x2 Wolf Pelt
---
[b][i][u]Belt[/u][/i][/b]
x1 Leather
x1 Gold Ingot
---
[b][i][u]Boots[/u][/i][/b]
x10 Leather Strips
x1 Iron Ingot
---
[b][i][u]Gloves[/u][/i][/b]
X3 Leather Strips
---

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ske4FS8.png[/img]
[b][u]
Permission[/u][/b]

If you wish to edit, change or alter this mod in anyway for distribution I kindly ask that you credit me. That's all! Otherwise...have at it!! :-)[/center]
author: Carter641
